story: You're deep in the heart of the cyberpunk gang stronghold, navigating through the maze-like corridors. Suddenly, you hear an ominous beep, and your visor detects a nearby security camera. What do you do?

actions.action: Deactivate the camera using your hacking skills
actions.good: Your skilled hacking abilities allow you to take out the security camera undetected. You continue on your way without any further interference.
actions.bad: While attempting to deactivate the camera, you accidentally trigger a trap that releases a swarm of drones. You take damage as they relentlessly attack you.

actions.action: Stealthily maneuver around the camera undetected
actions.good: You gracefully dodge and weave your way past the camera, remaining unnoticed. Your silent movements pay off as you continue on your mission without a hitch.
actions.bad: As you try to move past the camera, it suddenly comes to life, detecting your movement. An alarm blares as automated defenses engage, dealing damage to you.

actions.good: In a flurry of violence, you smash the camera into oblivion. Your destructive ways earn you a small cache of valuable items hidden nearby.
actions.bad: Your attempt to destroy the camera results in a sudden chain reaction that causes a catastrophic malfunction in the surrounding area. You take damage as chaos ensues and the loot remains out of reach.
